text: @MiaFarrow Wish Florida could say the same thing! Many following Trump's lead in Florida & his constant questioning the seriousness of Covid-19 at all! Half the people in the supermarket yesterday were not wearing masks! Ignorance is more contagious then this Coronavirus &maybe more deadly!
